references.paper_title: Partial fc: Training 10 million identities on a single machine
references.reason: This paper is used to assess the mean identity consistency of videos in the paper.

references.paper_title: A fast and elitist multiobjective genetic algorithm: Nsga-ii
references.reason: The paper uses this non-dominated sorting algorithm to find the upper and lower Pareto frontier sets for dynamic-preferred video pairs.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: As a foundational work, this paper encodes the user-provided identity into a specific token embedding within a frozen T2I model.

references.paper_title: Direct preference optimization: Your language model is secretly a reward model
references.reason: This paper introduces Direct Preference Optimization, which is used in the paper to introduce a hybrid customized preference optimization to directly encourage the model to generate ID-consistent and dynamic-preserved videos.

references.paper_title: Dreambooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper is a baseline to compare MagicID with both optimization methods and DreamBooth with LoRA.
